title: What are some good books to learn to draw caricatures? - Quora

response.answer_text: Tom Richmond, Mad Magazine's main caricature artist, wrote what I believe is the best book ever written on the fundamentals of drawing caricatures - The Mad Art of Caricature! His website has great info, too, but it pales in comparison to what is in his book.The Mad Art of Caricature!: A Serious Guide to Drawing Funny Faces: Tom Richmond: 9780983576709: Amazon.com: Books  Other books - Google these: Bob Staake wrote a classic book, Lenn Redman wrote another great one and it's always a good idea to broaden your understanding of the face and body by studying all the Andrew Loomis books...
